name: Vegas Crime Simulator
description:
* A great variety of ammunition and weapons!
* Car theft!
* Exciting gameplay: you are waiting for the most hotspots of criminality in Vegas!
In Vegasan offender appeared. He attacks ordinary citizens, kills policemen, steals different kinds of vehicles. You are provided the unique opportunity to become a super villain. Many different ammunition and weapons are at your disposal. Become a chief on the streets of criminality in Vegas!
